==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* {{w|Koʻolau Range|''Ko’olau''}} is the name given to the fragmented remnant of the eastern shield volcano in the {{w|Hawaii|Hawaiian}} island of {{w|Oahu|O’ahu}}.
* ''Ko’olau'' means "windward" in the {{w|Hawaiian language}}.
